description:
Welcome to this public speaking coaching series course. This is an introductory course that will quickly get you engaged in the speaking process. The course is designed for anyone interested in enhancing their presentation skills. This course has been synthesized to cover the following topics:

A. The definition of public speaking

B. Tools to practice relaxation and voice projection

C. The importance of giving an informational speech

D. The value of understanding an audience profile
title: Public Speaking Coaching Series - Build skills & confidence!
